item.title: HORSEM4N
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
The knight of death that controls four guns named after the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

The post HORSEM4N first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.001_

FILE No.001_

REAL NAME

VICTOR OCAÑAS

AGE

26

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • CYBERCYCLE “ARMAGEDÓN”
  • FOUR CYBERNETIC FIREARMS NAMED “CONQUEST”, “WAR”, “FAMINE”, AND “DEATH”

HORSEM4N

"Te veré en el infierno."

Hailing from Mexico, Víctor Ocañas was a natural shooter with outstanding agility. Due to his exceptional perception, Víctor was forced into a cartel to partake in dangerous street races for their entertainment. Serendipitously, Víctor was later recruited by Blitz Blues — a mercenary guild under direct control of the Gigacorp ZODIAK, where he started a career with CyberCycle. He took HORSEM4N as his code name, and only he can handle the CyberCycle known as Armagedón. Mastering all sorts of firearms, Víctor can simultaneously wield four guns, each named after the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Conquest, War, Famine, and Death. Víctor is the Reaper on the battlefield; while in private, he is fun, direct and hopelessly romantic.

item.title: SE7EN
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A cyborg ninja assassin with incredible agility.

The post SE7EN first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.002_

FILE No.002_

REAL NAME

ZAYINE STEINBERGER

AGE

21

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • FULL-BODY AUGMENTEDCYBORG KUNOICHI
  • CYBER CHAIN WHIP
  • DAMASCUS STEEL KNIFE

SE7EN

“I FEEL MY FATE IN WHAT I CANNOT FEAR.”

SE7EN’s real name is Zayina Steinberger. Due to a severe accident during her childhood, Zayina lost most of her body. But due to a stroke of luck, the legendary cyborg craftsman Kitō Takayuki granted her a second life with a surgery joining her consciousness to his combat cyborg No. 7. From that day forward, she was known only as SE7EN. In her new life, SE7EN received extreme training from her uncle AKIRA, and has become an assassin serving for the secret society Cavalon. Cold and silent, SE7EN’s exquisite face doesn’t show any specific racial features. With the mystery and aesthetics that come with the cyborg, SE7EN was scouted to be a model on the catwalk. Her most distinguishing feature is the biochemical hannya tattoo on her back. Furthermore, she has seven special abilities, such as Damascus steel knife, cybernetic chain-whip, active camouflage, bullet time accelerator, and more yet unrevealed…

item.title: AKIRA
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A rōnin who fights with dual cyber swords.

The post AKIRA first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.003_

FILE No.003_

REAL NAME

MIYAMOTO AKIRA

AGE

45

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • CYBER-BUSHIDO
  • UCHIGATANA “PRANCING DRAGON”
  • WAKIZASHI “FLYING PHOENIX”

AKIRA

“THE RONIN JUST CAN’T LEAVE THE SWORD AFTER ALL.”

From a prestigious samurai family in Japan, Miyamoto Akira received exceptional training in bushido and taijutsu. Influenced by traditional culture, AKIRA remained a humble man of solemn integrity who exercised restraint in all things, just like his ancestors. While on a liberation operation with U.N. peacekeepers to Southeast Asia, he met his best friend: Frank “Enigma” Steinberger. Years later, misery knocked on his door: AKIRA was involved in an explosion. In an attempt to save his beloved niece Zayina Steinberger, he lost his left eye and right hand in the accident. With the help of his mentor Kitō Takayuki and GO, he was outfitted with a prosthetic eye and a cybernetic right arm. Together with Prancing Dragon, his katana, and Flying Phoenix, his wakizashi short sword, AKIRA was deadlier than ever before. Fatal strikes combined by the pair of overclocking swords create a tremendous recoil that only AKIRA can handle with his years of experience and cybernetic enhancements.

item.title: AchT
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A brilliant hacker that passes between reality and digital dimensions.

The post AchT first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.004_

FILE No.004_

REAL NAME

PLEASANCE CARROLL

AGE

14

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • INSTINCTIVE HACKING

AchT

“AT ANY REACTION RATE, THERE’S NO HARM IN TRYING”

Pleasance Carroll was raised in secret by her scientist parents, Lutwidge and Charlene. Both served in a secret society Cavalon in an isolated, ancient castle hidden in the English countryside. After their passing during the FATE War, the girl found herself forced to roam a strange, modern world on her own. In the adventure, she stumbled upon her own unique G.A.M.E.R. skills and grew to become a greyhat hacker known only as AchT. She lives the other half of her double life as Alice through the Black Mirror, an avatar through which she traverses the digital world. She coded a wide variety of insane A.I. assistants named after Alice in Wonderland characters, like the White Rabbit, the Cheshire Cat, and the Mad Hatter. AchT robbed the rich to feed the poor together with her minions. While AchT’s real identity remains a mystery, it is evident that her hacking skills continue to grow as she learns to adapt to new environments and challenges. What she has discovered was only the tip to her talents, and only God knows her limit….

item.title: GO
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A sturdy technician with cybernetically enhanced combat armor.

The post GO first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.005_

FILE No.005_

REAL NAME

TEOTI ÓRONGONUI

AGE

40

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • CYBERNETICALLY ENHANCED COMBAT ARMOR “CYCLOPS

GO

“No one will ever take me down. The power lies on my side.”

Having apprenticed under Kitō Takayuki, the grandmaster for cybernetics, GO became a sworn friend to AKIRA for life. Born with the blood of aboriginals from the South Pacific Islands, GO has always taken pride in his heritage. Adorning his face and body are biochemical Kirituhi, tribal tattoos which he applied himself. While he appears fearsome and imposing, GO actually has a soft heart and tender nature. Even without the silicondria abilities of G.A.M.E.R.s, GO has been inspired and encouraged by his mentor, becoming a one-of-a-kind technician. He created the Cyclops, an exoskeleton with a simulated silicondria system, and used it as his exclusive combat weapon. After the FATE War, GO chose to leave for K.A.M.A., the KAPITEIN Armed Merchant Armada, to live reclusively in the Pacific Ocean. As a big fan of Japanese live action films called Tokusatu, he runs a theme bar there, known as the the AMIS. In the bar, behind a hidden door near the counter, is the best cyborg clinic on the black market. Through later adventures in cyberspace, GO met the young hacker AchT, and formed a great bond with her. Together they upgraded OMNI the android to become a unique prototype of the Multiple Operational Utility Strategic Enforcers.

item.title: OMNI
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
The mascot android with a brattish personality.

The post OMNI first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.006_

FILE No.006_

REAL NAME

OMNI

AGE

N/A

ABILITY & WEAPONS

  • ANY CYBER-WEAPON

OMNI

“I been sayin' that **** for years. And if you ever heard it, it meant your ***.”

OMNI is a Multiple Operational Utility Strategic Enforcer, or M.O.U.S.E — an android with tactical assistance abilities. Functioning as an artificial partner to enhance G.A.M.E.R.s’ abilities, OMNI is quite a unique M.O.U.S.E., due to his special modifications courtesy of AchT and GO. As his kernel processing unit is a result of black technology, OMNI is much more rebellious than a standard M.O.U.S.E. — he dresses like a retro-styled Streetpunk and behaves like one too. By nature, OMNI is reckless and emulative, just like a disobedient adolescent. In the team, OMNI is great fun to be around, though he strongly denies this.

item.title: PKD
item.dc:creator: Alfred
item.description:
A lone wolf of nobility who manipulates liquid-like magnetic micro-bots with his psychokinesis.

The post PKD first appeared on ROG SAGA.
item.content:encoded:
FILE No.007_

FILE No.007_

REAL NAME

PATRICK K. DRAKULA

AGE

27

ABILITY & WEAPONS

COLLECTIVE MICRO-BOTS SYSTEM “ŢEPEŞ”

PKD

“CHECKMATE!”

Once upon a time, hidden away in Slovenia, Patrik K. Drakula was raised in the Steel Cradle of Gigacorp ZODIAK. Even with a morbidly handsome face, Patrik’s feelings are suppressed and twisted under the blood and iron education to be a king. He found it difficult to control his emotions and eventually deemed his father as his foe for life. Gifted with silicondria abilities, a part of his family legacy, Patrik often loses himself and goes berserk. His father, Primož, strove to keep Patrik’s extreme emotions under control and transform his silicondria ability for combat. He ordered the laboratories under Gigacorp ZODIAK to develop Ţepeş, a collective micro-bots system. The hooded cloak Patrik wears is made up from black, liquid-like magnetic micro-bots, which he manipulates with his psychokinesis. Just as HORSEM4N is for the day as the Yang, PKD is for the night as the Yin.
